metadata.title: CVE-2021-45845 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Path Sanity Check script of FreeCAD 0.19 is vulnerable to OS commandinjection, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary commands via a craftedFCStd document.

criterions.comment: freecad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
